column5: Hey all,  I am new to this site and I am looking if anybody has a bass fishing report for the following lakes/river. I am headed out this extended weekend for a trip with friends to Gananoque. If you have any info, I would greatly appreciate it and I am going to post results we I get home after the trip. Thanks and tight lines!  I am looking for info on the following lakes/river  St. Lawrence River, launching out of Gananoque  Dog Lake  Cranberry Lake  Whitefish Lake  Charleston Lake  Lourborough check that spelling  Opinicon Lake  Thanks again for any info
Welcome aboard!  Sorry i don't have any info on the lakes you listed but good luck anyways!
That's quite a list and I don't have any experience with any of them.  Have you tried the Search function on the forums?
Thanks beats, I didn't try the search thing, I will get on that.
